author: Chris Davies

comments.message: Definitely a little crazy but I get what you're saying. Maybe it could be done a little less literally. How could you create something that would keep people from touching their own face?

description:
Dog cones prevent dogs from biting stitching. Many people, like myself, can't remember to not touch my face when being exposed to people with flu.

A cone for people looks crazy, but in the middle of a hot virus war zone, I'd wear one to remind myself not to touch my face if a full PPE wasn't available.

Much cheaper, and easier to distrubute than a full PPE. Might help 30% of transmissions.
